author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three local functionaries of AIADMK, DMDK and Congress were arrested and their vehicles impounded for mode code of conduct violations here on Wednesday.

Three cars with party flags and stickers were intercepted by flying squad personnel inHosur. .

Babu, Muniappan and Subramanian belonging toAIADMK, Congress and DMDK respectively were arrested and remanded at Dhramapuri and lodged at Salem prison.

Meanwhile, the flying squad personnel seized Rs.2.50 lakh from a car at Jujuvadi check post in Hosur on Wednesday. Ramachandran, a businessman, who was in possession of the cash, could not produce necessary documents to prove his claim.
title: Three held for poll code violation
